00064 class Matrix{
00065 private:
00066         int mRows, mCols;
00068         double *mData;
00070         int *mRowPermutations;
00072         int *mColPermutations;
00073 
00075         void initialize(int m, int n);
00077         void setFromColMajor(const double *M);
00079         void setFromRowMajor(const double *M);
00080 public:
00082         Matrix(int m, int n);
00084         Matrix(const Matrix &M);
00086         Matrix(const double *M, int m, int n, bool colMajor);
00087         virtual ~Matrix();
00088 
00089         inline double& elem(int m, int n);
00090         inline const double& elem(int m, int n) const;
00091         double *getData(){return mData;}
00092         void getData(std::vector<double> *data) const;
00093         int rows() const {return mRows;}
00094         int cols() const {return mCols;}
00095         Matrix getColumn(int c) const;
00096         Matrix getRow(int r) const;
00097         Matrix getSubMatrix(int startRow, int startCol, int rows, int cols) const;
00098 
00099         void setAllElements(double val);
00100         void copySubBlock(int startRow, int startCol, int rows, int cols, 
00101                                       const Matrix &m, int startMRow, int startMCol);
00102         void copySubMatrix(int startRow, int startCol, const Matrix &m){
00103                 copySubBlock(startRow, startCol, m.rows(), m.cols(), m, 0, 0);}
00104         void copyMatrix(const Matrix &m){copySubMatrix(0, 0, m);}
00105 
00106         friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &os, const Matrix &m);
00107         void print(FILE *fp = stderr) const;
00108 
00110         int rank() const;
00112         double fnorm() const;
00114         double absMax() const;
00115         void swapRows(int r1, int r2);
00116         void swapCols(int c1, int c2);
00118         void transpose();
00120         void eye();
00122         void multiply(double s);
00123 
00125         Matrix transposed() const;
00126 
00128         static Matrix EYE(int m, int n);
00130         static Matrix NEGEYE(int m, int n);
00132         static Matrix ZEROES(int m, int n);
00134         static Matrix PERMUTATION(int n, int *jpvt);
00136         static Matrix TRANSFORM(const transf &t);
00138         static Matrix ROTATION(const mat3 &rot);

00177 double&
00178 Matrix::elem(int m, int n) 
00179 {
00180         assert(m<mRows);
00181         assert(n<mCols);
00182         return mData[n*mRows + m];
00183 }
00184 
00185 const double&
00186 Matrix::elem(int m, int n) const
00187 {
00188         assert(m<mRows);
00189         assert(n<mCols);
00190         return mData[n*mRows + m];
00191 }
